title: Me and My Man Have a Little Situation
itunes:title: Me and My Man Have a Little Situation
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I met a gentleman seven months ago. I'm 45 and he's 37 when we met he lived 3 hours away so he decided to move to my area. It's been four months now since we've been in the same city and I'm starting to see issues with him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
